import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function BookTable(){ const [books, setBooks] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const EditDetails = (id) => { navigate("/book/edit/" + id); } useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:5001/books") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setBooks(data)).catch((err) => console.log(err.message)); }, []) return(

Book Records

Add new Book { books && books.map((item) => ) }
Name Author Category ISBN Created Modified Actions
{item.name} {item.author} {item.category} {item.isbn} {item.created} {item.modified}
) }
